rules.name: myRule_11
rules.label: Itesso BV - Account is not EU

Flow.description: Updates the Tax Code only when VAT code on Account does not match proper VAT code for FFA Company,
Flow.label: Sales Invoice Line Item - Update Tax Code for VAT

recordUpdates.name: myRule_11_A1
recordUpdates.label: Set Tax Code to Outside EU

recordUpdates.name: myRule_1_A1
recordUpdates.label: Set Tax Code to VAT - GBR

recordUpdates.name: myRule_3_A1
recordUpdates.label: Set Tax Code to VAT - SOUTH AFRICA

recordUpdates.name: myRule_5_A1
recordUpdates.label: Set Tax Code to NO VAT

recordUpdates.name: myRule_7_A1
recordUpdates.label: Set Tax Code to VAT - NL

recordUpdates.name: myRule_9_A1
recordUpdates.label: Set Tax Code to Inside EU
